classification.task_goal: Display data from Firebase in a RecyclerView.
primary_constraints: Data must be retrieved from the correct Firebase path.
Data types in UserData class must match the structure of the data in Firebase.
classification.reasoning: The assistant provided guidance on how to modify the code to access the correct Firebase path and handle data types. The user initially faced issues with data type mismatches and was able to implement the suggested changes, indicating a repair of the constraints.
